alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 4:04PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward and southeastern Palm Beach Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 404 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mission Bay, or near Deerfield Beach, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Pompano Beach, Boca Raton, Deerfield Beach, Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Margate, Lighthouse Point, Highland Beach, Coconut Creek, Parkland, Hillsboro Beach, Mission Bay, Boca Pointe, Boca Del Mar, Hamptons At Boca Raton, Village Of Golf, Whisper Walk, Godfrey Road and Kings Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County
